attributes.action: Not have a minute's silence at the England v Switzerland International match on 06.02.08
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It will only serve to highlight how much Man Utd are detested, as many fans will not observe the silence.

In addition, their fans are anti-England and so should not have the privelige of a minutes silence.

rejection.details: Association football is a self-governing sport in the UK. Please contact the FA
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
